mapper.select: SELECT id, userid, userip, nickname, passwd, title, content, views, photo1, photo2, photo3, likes, dislikes, reports, created_at FROM hottalk_post ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 10

SELECT h.*, COALESCE(c.comment_count, 0) as comment_count, (h.views * 0.2 + h.likes * 0.5 + COALESCE(c.comment_count, 0) * 0.3) as popularity_score FROM hottalk_post h LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) as comment_count FROM hottalk_comment GROUP BY post_id ) c ON h.id = c.post_id ORDER BY popularity_score DESC, h.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, 10
SELECT id, userid, userip, nickname, passwd, title, content, views, photo1, photo2, photo3, likes, dislikes, reports, created_at FROM hottalk_post WHERE id = #{id}
